#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,n,tp,beg,last,mid,flag;
    char sear[105],arr[1005][105];
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {

        scanf("%d",&n);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%s",arr[i]);
        }
        scanf("%s",sear);
        beg=0;
        last=n-1;
        flag=0;
        while(beg<=last)
        {
            mid = (beg+last)/2;
            tp=strcmp(sear,arr[mid]);
            if(tp==0)
            {
                flag=1;
                break;
            }
            else if(tp>0)
            {
                beg=mid+1;
            }
            else
            {
                last= mid-1;
            }
        }
        if(flag==1)
        {
            printf("yes\n");
        }
        else
        {
            printf("no\n");
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
